channel.title: Laravel on htr3n's
channel.link:
https://htr3n.github.io/tags/laravel/Recent content in Laravel on htr3n'sHugo -- gohugo.ioenThis work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.Wed, 09 May 2018 00:00:00 +0000 Integration Laravel 5 and Gentelella admin themehttps://htr3n.github.io/2018/05/integration-laravel-gentelella/Wed, 09 May 2018 00:00:00 +0000https://htr3n.github.io/2018/05/integration-laravel-gentelella/

Gentelella is a very nice and gently-looking Bootstrap based admin theme developed by Aigars Silkalns (known as puikinsh in Github), who founded colorlib.com. It can be integrated into several Web application frameworks. In this post, I noted down my simple development exercise in which Gentelella is used to decorated a Laravel 5 based Web application. This task is part of building my PHP based framework LaraMod.

LaraMod - Modularised Laravel 5https://htr3n.github.io/2018/01/laramod/Fri, 19 Jan 2018 00:00:00 +0000https://htr3n.github.io/2018/01/laramod/

Laravel is an amazing emerging, well-designed and well-developed PHP framework. It is currently under active development and has been among top Web development frameworks. The latest version of Laravel 5 imposes a conventional project structure that is well documented here.
